task.title: Choose, Shelve, Discard and Retrieve Manually:
task.shortdesc: Choose, Shelve, Discard and Retrieve nodes directly in the Graph using the "drag and drop" technique.

step.cmd: "Click and hold" to grab the node. This will illuminate the Shelf (green ring) and the Discard bin (red dot). The space within the ring is the Graph, where nodes will automatically link to form networks.
Without releasing the mouse, drag the node to the desired area.
Release the mouse to "drop" the node and execute the action.

taskbody.postreq: Nodes can be dragged between any of the three main areas: Shelf, Discard Bin and central Graph.
